thread.title: Trump, new DNC chair Tom Perez tangle on Twitter
thread.title_full: Trump, new DNC chair Tom Perez tangle on Twitter

title: Trump, new DNC chair Tom Perez tangle on Twitter
text:
Updated: 3:02 a.m. Sunday, Feb. 26, 2017 | Posted: 3:02 a.m. Sunday, Feb. 26, 2017 Trump, new DNC chair Tom Perez tangle on Twitter Related U.S. Labor Secretary Thomas Perez speaks during a National Press Club luncheon October 20, 2014 in Washington, DC. (Photo by Alex Wong/Getty Images) President Donald Trump headlines Rare.us WASHINGTON — 
Moments after announcing he wouldn’t attend the 2017 White House Correspondent’s Dinner, President Donald Trump made his first public statement on the election of former Labor Secretary Tom Perez to be the new head of the Democratic National Committee. 
>> Trump tweets he won't attend White House correspondents' dinner 
Perez was elected Saturday afternoon. He soon named Rep. Keith Ellison, D-Minnesota, to be the committee’s deputy chair. 
“Congratulations to Thomas Perez, who has just been named Chairman of the DNC. I could not be happier for him, or for the Republican Party!” Trump wrote. Congratulations to Thomas Perez, who has just been named Chairman of the DNC. I could not be happier for him, or for the Republican Party! — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump)
